name: econometrically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the testing of the performance of economies and economic theories using mathematical methods: It is difficult to measure the effect of advertising econometrically. We need to show econometrically which factors have a statistically significant impact on savings. Related words
econometric
econometrics
More examplesFewer examplesThe article seeks to explain, econometrically, why interest rates are currently so high.Most of the theories in his work are tested econometrically.This study aims to econometrically assess the effects of various factors on pensions policy.The results should be treated with caution, because of the difficulty of drawing firm conclusions econometrically.
